text: @WhiteHouse @jetrotter Ask Dr. Hahn why is the use of Hydroxychloroquine to treat covid-19 restricted to hospital use only when the use of Hydroxychloroquine for malaria, lupus and rheumatoid arthritis does not require hospitalization?
